title: Adani Green approves pacts for $444 mn TotalEnergies JV investment
description: India's Adani Green Energy has approved a $444 million investment deal with TotalEnergies to form a new joint venture. Adani and TotalEnergies will each own a 50% stake, focusing on a 1,150 megawatt portfolio of solar assets. Shares of Adani Green surged 5.9% on Monday.
